event_definitions:
You are performing Information Extraction on legal texts. Extract these event components:
- Event: Complete text span containing event information
- Event_who: Subject/object (applicant, respondent, judge, witness)
- Event_what: Main action/verb (lodged an application, decided, ordered, dismissed)
- Event_when: Temporal reference (dates, time expressions)
- Event_circumstance: Facts under judgment
- Event_procedure: Procedural dimension

Events contain event_who, event_what and event_when. Classify events as event_circumstance or event_procedure.
instruction:
EXTRACT ONLY - DO NOT SUMMARIZE OR REFORMULATE

Rules:
• Copy exact text spans as they appear in the source
• Use original wording without changes
• Do not add information not present in text
• If information is missing, leave empty

Extract legal events using exact text from the provided document. Return structured results with verbatim text spans only.
